website_summaries.verdict: Turns on and off with an auto-hand sensor, so you won't mess up a nail hitting a switch.  This makes it a great choice for DIY manicures.
pros: Fits one hand or foot at a time
Smart hand sensor and over-temperature protection
Cures gel, UV polish, acrylic gel, and builder gel, as well as top and base coats
Efficient UV bulb reduces drying time
Bulb lasts up to five years
cons: Wiring on some units seems to break quickly
Some wish the cord was longer

customer_reviews.title: 36w lamp
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the lamp quite some time ago. I wanted to wait to post a review but to be honest I absolutely love my lamp. I got it one what they were offering was the pretty one with the flowers all over it. I wasn't sure how it was going to work but I am completely satisfied. It's lightweight tiny easy to use and with my cluttered workstation it doesn't take up a whole lot of space. It's easy to move from one side to the other so I'm not twisting my whole body to accommodate the lamp. And the appearance is so beautiful. I absolutely love love LOVE this lamp!
customer_reviews.author: Charlies WifeTop Contributor: Nail Art

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality
customer_reviews.text: This product is a great quality. I’ve been doing my own manis and pedis for the past 5 years. I have an old UV lamp which takes forever to dry my Gel nails. This product dries my gel polish very fast. Pretty much cutting 1/2 of my nail curing time over my old UV Lamp. The reason why I gave this product 4 start over 5 is because of the plastic cover inside is very hard to take off. As you can see in the picture, there are still bits of pieces stuck inside. Overall, I would recommend this product! My nails turns out great.
customer_reviews.author: Fon Sanchez

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after testing it out
customer_reviews.text: I bought this a couple of months back and it worked perfectly fine. I ordered a polygel nail kit online (COVID made delivery time for nail kit very slow) so I just put the lamp back into its box and stored it on my shelf. Finally the nail kit comes in and I was so excited to try it out! I need to cure my base coat and this lamp decides to not turn on. I basically didn’t even get one single use out of it. Not happy and would not recommend this lamp.
customer_reviews.author: Tianna

customer_reviews.title: Does NOT work!!
customer_reviews.text: Trash! I put on a VERY light coat of gel polish and I’m on my 6th, 60 second use of the lamp! The polish has still not cured and is tacky! I will be returning ASAP, don’t waste your money!
customer_reviews.author: Mrs lopez

customer_reviews.title: Why are you still paying someone at a salon to do a shoddy job, when you can do it better yourself for much less?
customer_reviews.text: Never go to the salon again! Buy this lamp and some gellen color polish, gel foundation and gel top coat for the price of one mani/pedi and never pay the salon again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great little gel nail polish dryer
customer_reviews.text: This thing has worked perfectly for my wife as she's made the transition to gel nail polish. Turns on automatically when you put your hands underneath it and it has multiple features and functions depending on what you're doing. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Dare

customer_reviews.title: I give it a 5 very easy to work with very easy to attach in the ...
customer_reviews.text: I give it a 5 very easy to work with very easy to attach in the back it could work for pedicures and manicures and the UV light is not like overwhelming I also recommend buying the protective cloth if you going to get it it's always be safe than sorry but I love it very much I just tried and it works very well
customer_reviews.author: RMM

customer_reviews.title: Straigtfoward and simple
customer_reviews.text: This was a great product for my gel nail polish. It's much more budget friendly to invest in a nail lamp and polishes rather than go to the salon every two weeks. I find that this lamp is able to cure my polishes with no issues. It is also lightweight and relatively compact which is great for my small amount of storage space.
customer_reviews.author: KG Customer

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t dry nails
customer_reviews.text: This didn’t dry my nails at all. I had to run like 3 cycles of the 60 second option and it was still tacky. I ended up running my nails under ice cold water to quick dry afterwards. Thank goodness this was only $20 bucks
customer_reviews.author: N. Plummer

customer_reviews.title: Love this perfect answer to drying enamel nail polish and ...
customer_reviews.text: Love this perfect answer to drying enamel nail polish and perfectly curing gel polish. Handsome design, small, light-weight, and efficient. Glad to ::) ave it.
customer_reviews.author: Joanne E. Gregory

customer_reviews.title: 2 didn’t work
customer_reviews.text: First one didn’t work. Sent back for replacement. Replacement didn’t work. Sent back for refund. Would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: R. Wenzel

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: I’m going to say this loudly... A LITTLE GOES A LONG WAY! Do not put too much polish on your nails and expect the machine to dry your nails. Do two or three light coats with a dry after each coat.
customer_reviews.author: Alisson Diaz

customer_reviews.title: Great price and works well.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this during the pandemic. Great investment. Super light and easy to use. Plug it in, set your time and you’re done.
customer_reviews.author: BeautifulTee

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: This product is great for sensitive skin. What I really loved about this product was that it DOES NOT burn!!! Many other lamps have reviews about people feeling a burning sensation on their skin. This is why I chose this lamp instead. Although it does take longer to cure. You might have to cure each coat for little longer than usual.
customer_reviews.author: Isabella Burruel

customer_reviews.title: No more nail salon for me
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been growing may nails for at least 30yrs now. Going to a nail salon every 3 to 4 weeks. I invested in the tools to do it myself and I’m glad I did. This lamp is everything. Very light weight. And dries completely. ❤️❤️🎊
customer_reviews.author: Kbris

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: why didn't I start using this earlier!? Easy to use and easy to store. Will definitely be using for a long time
customer_reviews.author: rachael

customer_reviews.title: Works great! First UV LED nail lamp I've owned
customer_reviews.text: Works great! First UV LED nail lamp I've owned. It made drying/curing my nails super fast, so I didn't mess up my manicure.
customer_reviews.author: Littlecreek115

customer_reviews.title: ... received my lamp with in 2/3 days works really great i have had no problems with it have had ...
customer_reviews.text: mi received my lamp with in 2/3 days works really great i have had no problems with it have had it for about 3 weeks and i use it constantly I RECOMMEND THIS LAMP AND ITS AFFORDABLE YALL BETTER GET YALL 1. AMAZING

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BE FOOLED!!
customer_reviews.text: DON'T WASTE YOUR MONEY ON THIS LIGHT!!! USED IT TWICE AND IT STOPPED WORKING!!! I'M MAD I WASTED MY MONEY ON THIS
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works as good as the $150 ones
customer_reviews.text: Had for 3 months. I use it all the time. Great light. Gel nail polish stays on for 1 to 2 weeks. These lights are 120.0p at Sally beauty supply
customer_reviews.author: C. Burnett

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy this
customer_reviews.text: It doesn’t work. Even on 90s the very thin base coat I applied didn’t dry. I tried another 90s and it’s still sticky wet. My fingerprint is on my nail. Very poor job. I wonder how many intervals of 90s are required for this lamp to dry my nails?
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: works well
customer_reviews.text: now I can do it at home myself and save money
customer_reviews.author: alena

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Curing gel nails takes 2-3x as long under this light than at the salon, but for the price you can't beat it. Very lightweight and easy to use

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and a big money saver!
customer_reviews.text: Love my lamp! Saves me so much money! Easy to use - looks like I got them done at the salon.

customer_reviews.title: False Claims
customer_reviews.text: False advertising of being able to cure builder gel tried all different applications and DID NOT HARDEN wasted 20$. Returning for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Shay Wooten

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Great size. Very cute design. Dries jel polish very fast.

customer_reviews.title: 100% worth it!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Tried it on uv gel builder deffinately works i love it im soo happy with my purchase last uv lamp i bought was a total scam IM SO HAPPY WITH MY PURCHASE 🙌🏾🙌🏾🙌🏾🙌🏾
customer_reviews.author: Josephinea

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works great and it’s very pretty! Looks nice on my nail station. Thank you!

customer_reviews.title: Doesnt work
customer_reviews.text: Ok seriously. I've been trying to cure my nails for over an hour and they aren't curing all the way. Spend your money elsewhere. I'm super disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: ehhh its ok.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, does its job. Was sent the 24W instead of the advertised 36W. not sure if my trouble was with the light or the gel polish or a combination of both.
customer_reviews.author: monique

customer_reviews.title: Good lamp doesn't work for long
customer_reviews.text: The lamp worked for the first couple of months after the purchase. Tried using it for the 4th time and it won't turn on. Hopefully it will last longer for someone else

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: It takes half the time to dry my gel polish than the UV..love it

customer_reviews.title: Easy and looks great!!
customer_reviews.text: This gel polish is easy to work with and looks great!!
customer_reviews.author: MNova

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Works great, great value. Perfect for doing gel nails at home

customer_reviews.title: Great lamp for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Love this! Sets my polish pretty quickly and is fairly small and easy to store.

customer_reviews.title: It's ok
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two lights and one of them are not working properly, it seems to be preused because the lights are really weak.
customer_reviews.author: kristen

customer_reviews.title: Small but mighty
customer_reviews.text: So far I have used it for curing builder gel and it does the job without any feelings of burning. It's very light and portable.

customer_reviews.title: Does not work
customer_reviews.text: This item is horrible. Only works for 25 minutes. Shuts off and constantly flickers while in use. Would NOT reccomend.
customer_reviews.author: R.

customer_reviews.title: Good quality fast drying very cute design and portable just ...
customer_reviews.text: Worked exactly as stated. Good quality fast drying very cute design and portable just how I like
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Myers

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Brand new and easy to use. Came keep as well.
customer_reviews.author: Yamirka

customer_reviews.title: Very nice, very pretty
customer_reviews.text: Very nice, very pretty, and very quick. Works for both led and uv polishes. I recommend you buy this. For the price, it works very well. It would be a very great starter kit.
customer_reviews.author: shawn

customer_reviews.title: Going to have to buy another one!
customer_reviews.text: Does not work right. Seems like there is a short in it somewhere.
customer_reviews.author: punkin's pages

customer_reviews.title: Great quality/ perfect size
customer_reviews.text: This product is great! The quality is amazing for its price and the size is perfect for a small desk like mine. 100% recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Keyla Cortez

customer_reviews.title: NOT GELLEN BRAND! Generic UV Lamp!
customer_reviews.text: Not Gellen brand. Nowhere on the product or box does it say GelLen. It's just a generic UV lamp. However, it does work pretty well. Has 60, 30 and 10 second cure buttons. I would cure each coat of anything at 90 seconds if you want it dry to touch.
customer_reviews.author: Deja Louco

customer_reviews.title: Good work
customer_reviews.text: Does a good job, am new to this and this is my first lamp.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quality for a low price!
customer_reviews.text: No need to spend $200.00 for a LED nail light; this one works perfectly! Small. lightweight and great colors!
customer_reviews.author: Jeanette F Simkins

customer_reviews.title: Did not work at all.
customer_reviews.text: As soon as I opened the package I plugged it in and what do you know... it did not even work. What a piece of junk.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Mathew

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this for about 6 months now. No problems at all and it drys nails pretty fast.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... and for the price I'd say it is the best deal right now on amazon
customer_reviews.text: This nail lap has dried my nails perfectly I have no complaints with its performance at all and for the price I'd say it is the best deal right now on amazon. The only reason ik give 4 stars is because the little decal on it that says 36 watt started to come off immediately....I kind of liked the decal lol thats the only reason it lost a star for me. I was surprised the decal came off with how much I baby this lamp. I don't want to have to buy another one so I am super careful with it. Performance wise this lamp is great and I highly recommend you purchase one.
customer_reviews.author: Cory

customer_reviews.title: Perfect quality for not alot of money!
customer_reviews.text: Fits one hand at a time but works just as it should! Super cute! Very happy!
customer_reviews.author: Rachael

customer_reviews.title: Great price and works well
customer_reviews.text: Does great at curing my nails, but the plug in in the back of the machine is a bit loose. Not very snug.
customer_reviews.author: AJ

customer_reviews.title: It's a plug in and you press the buttons there's no sensor
customer_reviews.text: Really good for a starter Light ! durable Strong high quality light that gets the job done ✅
customer_reviews.author: brandy anderson

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this lamp I had one smaller and this one is so much bigger and better
customer_reviews.author: Tasha

customer_reviews.title: Fire hazard and Potential electrical issues, SMOKING!
customer_reviews.text: It almost caught fire about an hour or so ago while I was using it. I've used it maybe four or five times and bought it in the last several months. Tonight I was using it. At first I noticed a plastic-like smell, and then the smell got stronger. I looked at it and it was smoking. The smoke was coming from inside the unit (where the hand is placed). It's unusable now, and I feel nervous about asking for a replacement because I don't know if I want another of something that I've personally witnessed begin to smoke and overheat.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: It calle broken the light led on the top wss broken 😭😭 I need a refund plis but i can return the article because I am un Ecuador 🇪🇨 and the cost is too high to send
customer_reviews.author: Jenny Vera

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Bought in Jan, only used 1 or 2 times a month and it already stopped working.
customer_reviews.author: Ariana L.

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Takes linger to cure than the instructions state but works well.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra McArthur

customer_reviews.title: Gets the job done!
customer_reviews.text: I was nervous about buying an inexpensive nail lamp because I did not want to get one that didn’t work at all. A friend ordered this same lamp and recommended it. When I received it my initial thought was it looked a little cheap....which it was....but to my surprise it worked great! I was cautious and left my nails to cure longer than instructed with the polish I used (60 sec vs 30 sec). I feel that for the $20 it is worth it. Not sure how long the lamp itself will last but at the price, I’d just buy the same one again to replace it.
customer_reviews.author: QuickBee

customer_reviews.title: Works with everything.
customer_reviews.text: Works great. I use polygels (vanalisa, urban graffiti), gel polish, builder gel and it works great for everything.
customer_reviews.author: Fiestachik

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: product was cheap didn’t work at all !!! Don’t waste your money !!!
customer_reviews.author: jose colon

customer_reviews.title: Get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: This lamp did not work. At one point I had my hand under it for an hour. The gel never cured. I really wasted money on the product
customer_reviews.author: Aries95

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: This doesn't cure any polish at all don't waste your money honey
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly

customer_reviews.title: Buttons super cheap and damaged
customer_reviews.text: The 30 second button came bashed in. Probably while in delivery. So angry. Now I can only use the 15 second button and it takes twice as long.
customer_reviews.author: Marla Monnette

customer_reviews.title: Perfect lamp for nails
customer_reviews.text: I've had my lamp for a while now and it has worked wonders for me. I like how it has 3 timer settings which helps with making sure everything is cured properly.
customer_reviews.author: ECO

customer_reviews.title: Great lamp for home gels
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a Christmas gift after receiving mine as a gift last year. I’ve done my own gels for the last 11 months and this lamp has worked perfectly the whole time.
customer_reviews.author: Abbie

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: It did not last two uses. I took it overseas for my sister use and the two time it was used the light was twinkling and did not cure.
customer_reviews.author: Orquidea

customer_reviews.title: Gellen
customer_reviews.text: For the price it’s good but hard to get thumb in
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca D.

customer_reviews.title: Great light cures UC and gel polish fast
customer_reviews.text: Looove this led light it cures nails so fast can’t express how amazing this led light is. Worth every cent😀
customer_reviews.author: SparkleMom

customer_reviews.title: Good machine.
customer_reviews.text: It’s lightweight. Does the job failproof each and every time.
customer_reviews.author: V. R.G.

customer_reviews.title: A long time to cure gel polish
customer_reviews.text: It is very cute but I have to press the 60s timer at least 3x to cure the Gel polish, I only put one coat per polish( base, gel polish, top coat) so with that being said I will keep this one for regular polish and purchase a different one for my gel polish.
customer_reviews.author: Brittani Dubose

customer_reviews.title: Powerful little light this is a great light.
customer_reviews.text: You can for all your fingers inside and it's sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda RasmusonTop Contributor: Calligraphy

customer_reviews.title: Worked As Needed For Great Price
customer_reviews.text: So it worked as needed, used it the day I got it delivered and worked perfectly
customer_reviews.author: Tammy Olson

customer_reviews.title: Its quiet small
customer_reviews.text: It’s small so it’s portable & it works just fine. Perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Dayana T.

customer_reviews.title: Fire hazard!
customer_reviews.text: Used this twice. Once on base, then again on first layer of color. It started smoking. White noxious smoke began to pour out of it. I unplugged and put outside. Do not buy this model.
customer_reviews.author: Daisy

product_meta.title: Gellen Professional 24W UV LED Nail Lamp for Gel Polish- with Sensor 3 Timers Quick Dry Home Gel Manicure Pedicure Dryer Light Color (Snow White)
product_meta.description:
Color:Snow WhiteGellen Piano Black Big Watt Nail Lamp
This is ture 24W LED lamp, built-in 12pcs high power LED beads, which can quickly finish gel application. 

Now, you can enjoy your own wonderful nail art salon at home! 
Gellen LED Nail Dryer LAMP is power-saving, time-saving and no harm to hands/eyes.
Be the very convenient to dry your nail and toe, easy to use, with no space occupation for you, eye-catching piano black rainbow design.

FEATURES: Suitable for nail salon, nail art school/college, personal use, wholesale, etc Effectively and quickly cured all UV and gel 
based products. Fast curing of UV/LED gels one hand or 5 toes at a time. 

SPECIFICATION: 
Color: Snow White 
Funtion mode: 1. auto-induction smart sensor. 2. 30s, 60s, 90s dry time for choice 
Lighit Color: blue 
Power rate: 24Watt Using Life: 35000-50000 hours 
Voltage: 110V
Size: 190*135*79mm (L*W*H) 
Plug type: US 2 flat pin 

Package included: 
24W LED lamp *1 
Power adapter *1
Gift Box
feature_bullets: ★SMART SAFETY SYSTEM: Smart over-temperature protection, reducing burning sensation. Smart hand sensor, hands in - on, hands out - off.
★FAST CURING: 2X faster curing than traditional nail dryers, save more time.

ENVIRONMENT PROTECTION: 24W LED light , non-harmful substances to human body.★ALL IN ONE: cure all gel, like UV and gel nail polish, top coat base coat, acrylic gel, builder gel, etc. No brand requirements though.
★MUTIFUNCTIONAL: Popular open design, curing 5 ginernails/toenails at the same time, best for home gel manicure use and nail salon.
★RELIABLE: Highly Efficient, this lamp can greatly reduces drying time for gel applications, likewise, Long-Lasting LED Bulbs Provide Up to Five Years of Nonstop Use.

specifications.Manufacturer: Guangzhou Himatt Network Technology Co., Ltd.
